name: Werebat
description: The Werebat is a medium humanoid creature embodying traits of both a human and a bat, known for its ability to fly quickly and stealthily.
memorable: Its ability to shapeshift and its curse inflicting bite attack make it a notable adversary.
goals: To stalk its prey and surprise enemies under the cover of darkness.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other lycanthropic creatures or nocturnal predators.
environment: Typically found in dark environments, often in caves or ruined structures.
strengths: Strong against nonmagical attacks unless made with silver, and has a significant speed advantage while flying.
weaknesses: Sensitive to sunlight, suffering disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks when exposed.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack feature with mace, bite, and claw attacks, each inflicting significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: The bite attack can curse humanoids with werebat lycanthropy, posing a serious threat beyond physical damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to navigate in darkness effectively.
skills: Has proficiency in stealth and perception, making it adept at ambushing foes.
additional_information: Ability to shapeshift into a bat-humanoid hybrid or a Medium-sized bat.
In bat form, it cannot communicate.
Advantage on sound-based perception checks due to keen hearing.
Significant mobility due to high flying speed.
Can endure several hits in battle due to its hit points.

creature vulnerable to sunlight with echolocation
stealthy monster that can fly and bite
humanoid that deals lycanthropy with its bite
